summary: HE'S GOT THE WORLD BY THE TAIL. Imagine a mutt who can outplay Beckham on the field while turning ateam of laughable misfits into a lean mean fighting machine. This pooch has got the international soccer scene by the tail.
cast: Nick Moran|Jake Thomas|Lori Heuring|Scott Cleverdon|Orson Bean|Darren Keefe Reiher|Frank Simons|Jack McGee|Tony Collins|Eric Don|J.B. Ghuman Jr.|Vince Grant|Jeremy Howard|Eric Jacobs|John Kassir|Steve Monroe|Kenneth Moskow|Sarah Rafferty|Darren Richardson|Justin Thomson|Chip|Kelly|Carlos Alazraqui|Matthew Hutcherson|Renneker Jenkins|Dassler Jimenez
title: Un delantero muy peludo
